verses.verse: Hear, <WH8085> O Israel: <WH3478> Thou <WH859> art to pass over <WH5674> <WH853> Jordan <WH3383> this day, <WH3117> to go in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> nations <WH1471> greater <WH1419> and mightier <WH6099> than <WH4480> thyself, cities <WH5892> great <WH1419> and fenced up <WH1219> to heaven, <WH8064>

A people <WH5971> great <WH1419> and tall, <WH7311> the children <WH1121> of the Anakims, <WH6062> whom <WH834> thou <WH859> knowest, <WH3045> and of whom thou <WH859> hast heard <WH8085> say, Who <WH4310> can stand <WH3320> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Anak! <WH6061>

Understand <WH3045> therefore this day, <WH3117> that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> is he <WH1931> which goeth over <WH5674> before <WH6440> thee; as a consuming <WH398> fire <WH784> he <WH1931> shall destroy <WH8045> them, and he <WH1931> shall bring them down <WH3665> before thy face: <WH6440> so shalt thou drive them out, <WH3423> and destroy <WH6> them quickly, <WH4118> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath said <WH1696> unto thee.

Speak <WH559> not <WH408> thou in thine heart, <WH3824> after that the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath cast them out <WH1920> <WH853> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> thee, saying, <WH559> For my righteousness <WH6666> the LORD <WH3068> hath brought me in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> <WH853> this <WH2063> land: <WH776> but for the wickedness <WH7564> of these <WH428> nations <WH1471> the LORD <WH3068> doth drive them out <WH3423> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> thee.

Not <WH3808> for thy righteousness, <WH6666> or for the uprightness <WH3476> of thine heart, <WH3824> dost thou <WH859> go <WH935> to possess <WH3423> <WH853> their land: <WH776> but <WH3588> for the wickedness <WH7564> of these <WH428> nations <WH1471> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> doth drive them out <WH3423> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> thee, and that <WH4616> he may perform <WH6965> <WH853> the word <WH1697> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> swore <WH7650> unto thy fathers, <WH1> Abraham, <WH85> Isaac, <WH3327> and Jacob. <WH3290>

Understand <WH3045> therefore, that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee not <WH3808> <WH853> this <WH2063> good <WH2896> land <WH776> to possess <WH3423> it for thy righteousness; <WH6666> for <WH3588> thou <WH859> art a stiffnecked <WH7186> <WH6203> people. <WH5971>

Remember, <WH2142> and forget <WH7911> not, <WH408> <WH853> how <WH834> thou provokedst <WH7107> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> to wrath in the wilderness: <WH4057> from <WH4480> the day <WH3117> that <WH834> thou didst depart <WH3318> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> until <WH5704> ye came <WH935> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> place, <WH4725> ye have been <WH1961> rebellious <WH4784> against <WH5973> the LORD. <WH3068>
Also in Horeb <WH2722> ye provoked <WH7107> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> to wrath, so that the LORD <WH3068> was angry <WH599> with you to have destroyed <WH8045> you.

When I was gone up <WH5927> into the mount <WH2022> to receive <WH3947> the tables <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> even the tables <WH3871> of the covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> made <WH3772> with <WH5973> you, then I abode <WH3427> in the mount <WH2022> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights, <WH3915> I neither <WH3808> did eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> nor <WH3808> drink <WH8354> water: <WH4325>

And the LORD <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> unto <WH413> me <WH853> two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68> written <WH3789> with the finger <WH676> of God; <WH430> and on <WH5921> them was written according to all <WH3605> the words, <WH1697> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> with <WH5973> you in the mount <WH2022> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of the fire <WH784> in the day <WH3117> of the assembly. <WH6951>

And it came to pass <WH1961> at the end <WH4480> <WH7093> of forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights, <WH3915> that the LORD <WH3068> gave <WH5414> <WH413> me <WH853> the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> even the tables <WH3871> of the covenant. <WH1285>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Arise, <WH6965> get thee down <WH3381> quickly <WH4118> from hence; <WH4480> <WH2088> for <WH3588> thy people <WH5971> which <WH834> thou hast brought forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4480> <WH4714> have corrupted <WH7843> themselves; they are quickly <WH4118> turned aside <WH5493> out of <WH4480> the way <WH1870> which <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> them; they have made <WH6213> them a molten image. <WH4541>

Furthermore the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559> I have seen <WH7200> <WH853> this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> and, behold, <WH2009> it <WH1931> is a stiffnecked <WH7186> <WH6203> people: <WH5971>

Let me alone, <WH7503> <WH4480> that I may destroy <WH8045> them, and blot out <WH4229> <WH853> their name <WH8034> from under <WH4480> <WH8478> heaven: <WH8064> and I will make <WH6213> of thee a nation <WH1471> mightier <WH6099> and greater <WH7227> than <WH4480> they.

So I turned <WH6437> and came down <WH3381> from <WH4480> the mount, <WH2022> and the mount <WH2022> burned <WH1197> with fire: <WH784> and the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of the covenant <WH1285> were in <WH5921> my two <WH8147> hands. <WH3027>

And I looked, <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> ye had sinned <WH2398> against the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and had made <WH6213> you a molten <WH4541> calf: <WH5695> ye had turned aside <WH5493> quickly <WH4118> out of <WH4480> the way <WH1870> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> you.
And I took <WH8610> the two <WH8147> tables, <WH3871> and cast <WH7993> them out of <WH4480> <WH5921> my two <WH8147> hands, <WH3027> and broke <WH7665> them before your eyes. <WH5869>

And I fell down <WH5307> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> as at the first, <WH7223> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights: <WH3915> I did neither <WH3808> eat <WH398> bread, <WH3899> nor <WH3808> drink <WH8354> water, <WH4325> because of <WH5921> all <WH3605> your sins <WH2403> which <WH834> ye sinned, <WH2398> in doing <WH6213> wickedly <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD, <WH3068> to provoke him to anger. <WH3707>

For <WH3588> I was afraid <WH3025> of <WH4480> <WH6440> the anger <WH639> and hot displeasure, <WH2534> wherewith <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> was wroth <WH7107> against <WH5921> you to destroy <WH8045> you. But the LORD <WH3068> hearkened <WH8085> unto <WH413> me at that <WH1931> time <WH6471> also. <WH1571>

And the LORD <WH3068> was very angry <WH599> <WH3966> with Aaron <WH175> to have destroyed <WH8045> him: and I prayed <WH6419> for <WH1157> Aaron <WH175> also <WH1571> the same <WH1931> time. <WH6256>

And I took <WH3947> your sin, <WH2403> <WH853> the calf <WH5695> which <WH834> ye had made, <WH6213> and burnt <WH8313> it with fire, <WH784> and stamped <WH3807> it, and ground <WH2912> it very small, <WH3190> even until <WH5704> it <WH834> was as small <WH1854> as dust: <WH6083> and I cast <WH7993> <WH853> the dust <WH6083> thereof into <WH413> the brook <WH5158> that descended <WH3381> out of <WH4480> the mount. <WH2022>
And at Taberah, <WH8404> and at Massah, <WH4532> and at Kibroth-hattaavah, <WH6914> ye provoked <WH7107> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> to wrath.

Likewise when the LORD <WH3068> sent <WH7971> you from Kadesh-barnea, <WH4480> <WH6947> saying, <WH559> Go up <WH5927> and possess <WH3423> <WH853> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I have given <WH5414> you; then ye rebelled against <WH4784> <WH853> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and ye believed <WH539> him not, <WH3808> nor <WH3808> hearkened <WH8085> to his voice. <WH6963>
Ye have been <WH1961> rebellious <WH4784> against <WH5973> the LORD <WH3068> from the day <WH4480> <WH3117> that I knew <WH3045> you.

Thus I fell down <WH5307> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> <WH853> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights, <WH3915> as <WH834> I fell down <WH5307> at the first; because <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> had said <WH559> he would destroy <WH8045> you.

I prayed <WH6419> therefore unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> and said, <WH559> O Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> destroy <WH7843> not <WH408> thy people <WH5971> and thine inheritance, <WH5159> which <WH834> thou hast redeemed <WH6299> through thy greatness, <WH1433> which <WH834> thou hast brought forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4480> <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand. <WH3027>

Remember <WH2142> thy servants, <WH5650> Abraham, <WH85> Isaac, <WH3327> and Jacob; <WH3290> look <WH6437> not <WH408> unto <WH413> the stubbornness <WH7190> of this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> nor to <WH413> their wickedness, <WH7562> nor to <WH413> their sin: <WH2403>

Lest <WH6435> the land <WH776> whence <WH834> <WH4480> <WH8034> thou broughtest us out <WH3318> say, <WH559> Because the LORD <WH3068> was not able <WH4480> <WH1097> <WH3201> to bring <WH935> them into <WH413> the land <WH776> which <WH834> he promised <WH1696> them, and because he hated <WH4480> <WH8135> them, he hath brought them out <WH3318> to slay <WH4191> them in the wilderness. <WH4057>

Yet they <WH1992> are thy people <WH5971> and thine inheritance, <WH5159> which <WH834> thou broughtest out <WH3318> by thy mighty <WH1419> power <WH3581> and by thy stretched out <WH5186> arm. <WH2220>
